name: Land Navigation
prompt: Hey, not going to lie, kind of in a pickle! I'm trapped on a cartesian grid and need to find my way back to my hut at the Middle. Give me a second to consult the sun and clouds and then I'll tell you two signed integers when your program is running. Oh yeah, you need to write a program. Tell me which quadrant I'm in..1st, 2nd, 3rd, or 4th. Please!
